#Text=Main Asami Sato Bolin Bumi Kai Korra Mako Tenzin Antagonists Ming - Hua Ghazan Zaheer says : " Minor Ikki Kuon Kya Meelo Pema Rohan Ryu Ryu 's mother White Lotus sentries Zuko " Shiro Shinobi says : " Avatar Korra is back , and yours truly , Shiro Shinobi , could n't be more thrilled !
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , I agree .
#Text=Let 's toughen you up .
#Text=" Wu says : " Daaah , I was n't ready !
#Text=Wu down !
#Text=" Yin says : " What 's going on ?
#Text=Mako , how dare you injure the prince !
#Text=Would his royal highness like a cherry - berry lemonade ?
#Text=" Wu says : " And maybe some of those sticky dumplings , too ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Look at you !
#Text=You 're so weak , " Wu down " is your catchphrase .
#Text=" Wu says : " I know , I 'm a wimp .
#Text=But it 's not my fault , I was born that way !
#Text=I 'm not like you Mako , I was n't raised by a pack of cops in the woods .
#Text=" Mako says : " You do n't know anything about me , do you ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Yeah , I 'm drawing a blank .
#Text=Why is that ?
#Text=How do I not know stuff about you ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Uhh ... you never asked ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Well , I 'm asking now !
#Text=What 's your favorite food ?
#Text=What 's your favorite color ?
#Text=Is there a special lady in your life ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Not since Korra and I broke up .
#Text=" Wu says : " What ?
#Text=You dated the Avatar ?
#Text=Sit !
#Text=You and I need to have a little gab session right now !
#Text=How 'd you guys first meet ?
#Text="
